channel.desc: Gargamel needs someone to watch over the Smurfs he's captured in 'Lucretia Seizes Power', then in 'Papa Smurf Lost His Mind', Papa Smurf loses his memory and starts acting like a child. (S4, ep 12).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: DORA
channel.desc: Dora helps a boy band before the show in 'The Bunny Boyz', then in 'Dancing Osito', Dora gets Isabela's teddy bear back. (S3, ep 8).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: Cap'n Turbot's boat is starting to sink in 'Pups Save a Floundering Francois', and then in 'Pups Save the Pop Up Penguins', stowaway penguins have scattered around Adventure Bay.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: Daring Danny X accidently drives off with turtle eggs in 'Pups Save the Runaway Turtles', then in 'Pups Save the Shivering Sheep', Farmer Al's sheep run away, and Mayor Humdinger's kittens go missing.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Rubble & Crew
channel.desc: The Crew helps Charger fall asleep in 'The Crew Builds Charger a Super Bed', then in 'The Crew Builds a Super Squirrely Whirly Playground', the pups play like Super Squirrely Whirly. (S2, ep 7).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines
channel.desc: Tyre Trouble: Blaze and his pals are gearing up for a big race with brand new tyres! But Crusher tricks Starla, Darington and Stripes into putting on out-of-control silly tyres! (S8, ep 6).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines
channel.desc: Space Alien Adventure!: Blaze and AJ make friends with a space alien named Gormy! But when Gormy's jetpack loses power, they set out to help him fly home to his alien family! (S5, ep 16).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Journey to the Centre of the Earth: Naughty Daisy and Poppy magic their teacher, Mrs Fotheringill to the centre of the Earth, so Granpapa Thistle leads Ben and Holly on a rescue mission.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Cows: The children are at the Elf Farm, but to learn where milk comes from they must visit a big farm, to find cows. They travel to Lucy Big's farm, where she shows them all the animals.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Buttercups, Daisies and Dandelions: During a picnic in her garden, cousin Chloe shows Peppa and George fun things to do with wild flowers.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: Mr. Porter's high-tech waiter robot can't stop cleaning in 'Pups Save a Waiter-Bot', then in 'Pups Stop a Pie-Clone', Mayor Humdinger creates a cyclone of delicious pies! (S7, ep 5).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: Mayor Humdinger steals a jukebox in 'Pups Save a Jukebox', then in 'Pups Save a Mayor on a Wire', a hungry eagle causes Mayor Goodway's tightrope walking lesson to go wrong. (S9, ep 24).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Movie Night: Peppa and friends are at Penny Polar Bear's house for a movie night. But before they can watch it, the children need to decide where to sit, and which popcorn to eat. (S7, ep 18).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Art House Day: Granny Sheep and Suzy take Granny Pig and Peppa around Art House Day. After a day full of screen printing and silhouette miniatures, Granny Pig finds the perfect artwork. (S7, ep 19).

channel.title: Peppa Pig

channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Racquet Games: Miss Rabbit gives Peppa and friends a tennis lesson, but the tennis balls get everywhere! So, the children play badminton instead and it's a lot easier. (S7, ep 24).

channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Magic Trick: Mummy Elephant invites Peppa and Daddy Pig to perform magic at Emily's birthday party, and Peppa shows her friends how the magic trick works. (S7, ep 22).

channel.title: Peppa Pig

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Jumping Stick: Daddy Pig receives a jumping stick and tries to show how to use it, but finds it difficult. Peppa and her friends struggle too. But there's always jumping in muddy puddles! (S7, ep 23).
